products.title: Maine Ll Blackout Angora Roller Blind
products.description: The maine ll blackout range is available in a choice of 3 beautiful colours. A perfect addition to any room for a very affordable price. This brown roller blind will create a cosy feel and is perfect for rooms where keeping light out is key such as your bedroom or living room. Product id: db-rbx1221 fabric colour: angora material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes maine ll blackout angora roller blind in cream/brown.

products.title: Podium Blackout Midnight Roller Blind
products.description: This chic pattern will make a bold graphic statement thanks to its interplay of horizontal lines. Contrasting shades of grey give this streamlined print an intriguing depth and will add a sleek, masculine edge to your space. The podium midnight blackout roller blind is created from durable blackout fabric to help you maintain your peace and privacy in a swift and simple motion using the sidewinder chain.

products.title: Midas Stripe Blackout Crystal Roller Blind
products.description: The midas blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. The blackout feature means you can control how much light you want in the room. Their cream midas blackout crystal roller blind is visually strong and striking. Add a touch of style to your space with this blind. Product id: sdb-rbx1522 fabric colour: crystal material: 100% polyester lining: white blackout backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes midas stripe blackout crystal roller blind in cream.

products.title: Nile 63mm Taped White Real Wood
products.description: The nile taped range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. The matching cotton tape adds an extra feel of luxury. This classic white taped wood blind will look great in any room in your home as it will create a fresh, crisp and light feel. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously.

products.title: Nile 63mm Taped Oyster Real Wood
products.description: The nile taped range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. The matching cotton tape adds an extra feel of luxury. This classic cream taped wood blind will look great in rooms with neutral decor or as a contrast to darker colours. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Ecostyle 63mm Taped Cotton Faux Wood
products.description: Achieve a contemporary chic look with the ecostyle taped cotton faux wood blind in white. Designed with white vertical taping, the blinds create a modern shutter-like silhouette in your home. Its faux wood material ensures a durable, waterproof product, while the soft grain finish adds depth and texture to your space. Product id: sdb-wsb0820 fabric colour: faux cotton embossed material: upvc headrail: high quality headrail with top or face fix brackets and matching pelmet slat width: 63mm slat material: embossed finish control type: co-ordinated raise & tilt dual cords with matching toggles energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention tape colour: white light filtering: yes ecostyle 63mm taped cotton faux wood in white.

products.title: Apollo, Endeavour - Roller Blind
products.description: The apollo in endeavour is as creamy as cream can be, making this the ideal choice for keeping a room looking light and airy, even when shut. The textured fabric of the apollo range adds some character to an otherwise neutral shade, adding depth to the lightweight material. The endeavour will pair wonderfully with browns and beiges for a confident contrasting look in a dining room or living room.

products.title: Capella, Atlantic Mystic - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take in atlantic mystic you come to see just how much work has gone into creating the delicate silver patterning. The way in which the artisan silver threads shimmer underneath the light gives the florals a life of their own. One which you get to celebrate every time you look at your new roller blinds. Taking a chance and being bold with your colours is what mystic allows you to do. The silver and blue work wonders when set against a matching red.

products.title: Delicia, Aquamarine - Roller Blind
products.description: As you look at delicia aquamarine you will see the relaxed cream background contrasting with the vibrant electric blue petals. This allows you to see two different sides of the colour spectrum at the same time, and to understand that they can harmonise in unexpected ways. Embrace the vitality of the blue by matching it with a crisp apple green. This will enable you to breathe new life into any space, and to do it in a way that introduces plenty of natural colour and vitality.

products.title: Kindling, Chiffon - Roller Blind
products.description: For those of you that love neutral tones topped off with show stopping elegance we give you kindling chiffon. The neutral fabric is intricate, fine, and light. But it's the free-flowing silver curves that bring chiffon into its own. They drift casually down the fabric, taking their time and giving you plenty of opportunity to take them all in. Chiffon sits gently in the background adding the sparkle and finishing touch to any room.

products.title: Dune, Ocean - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing we love about dune ocean is that it offers your home a relaxing and moody blue that will live long in the memory. When you pair it with the gentle backdrop and relaxed minimalist style you get a sense of just what you can do with it. Now that you've heard their interpretation of ocean it's up to you to turn it into something you're proud to have in your home. Take your time with it and remind that great decor is something that comes to those who wait.

products.title: Dune, Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Kindling, Fireworks - Roller Blind
products.description: Kindling in fireworks allows you to add a real crescendo of colour and style to proceedings in seconds. The deep blue is elegant and poised, and the rich copper colour of the patterning stands proud in the foreground. This is a fabric that wants to be noticed, and gets noticed in style. If you are short on ideas for the upstairs landing, why not add fireworks to the mix to create a new focal point? It has the charm and energy needed to catch the eye when you're moving through one of the hardest to decorate spaces in the house.

products.title: Delicia, Pickle - Roller Blind
products.description: Bright and eye-catching, the delicia pickle combines apple green with a soft dove grey on a creamy backdrop that lets the natural light filter through, perfect for updating an older home or adding to the contemporary style of a new build. Complement a green or grey dcor scheme in the master or guest bedroom, and accent with matching ornaments and soft furnishings, or simply use to add a pop of colour in a neutral downstairs cloakroom, bathroom, or utility room.

products.title: Dune, Tumeric - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune tumeric takes its name from a spice that is something of an enigma. The flavour is to die for and yet it's the colour that's the most striking thing about it. As you look at this latest offering from the dune range you can feel the autumnal glow of the fabric radiating right back at you. Match with other shades of woody brown for a portfolio of natural colour that instantly puts you at ease.

products.title: Capella, Rose Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Capella in rose gold combines understated minimalism with luxurious finishing to create a homage to floral fabric that will live long in the memory. The way in which the rose gold threads dance with the light is sure to stay with you and inspire you for years to come. Add in some other precious metallic finishes in moderation and you'll be able to continue your luxury theme. The secret is to only deploy them as elegant patterns and prints.

products.title: Delicia, Powder Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Delicia powder pink allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you see it thanks to the faded look of the fabric. This gives it a timeless quality that invites you to sit back and reflect, and to take in the gentle lines as they trace their way across the canvas. Look closer and you come to see how the free-flowing beauty has been achieved through a lack of a constraining black outline.

products.title: Kindling, Ruby - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a look at the beauty of kindling ruby and what do you see first? Is it the vivid colour of the red? Or the exquisite luxury of the gold? It really doesn't matter because you get to enjoy them both for years to come, dancing with the light as they adorn your new look window space. Gold threads and matching deep blues are just what you need to weave ruby into your existing tapestry. It's what allows you to make a statement that this is a luxury home, but without going over the top and overwhelming the senses.

products.title: Capella, Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Kindling, Peacock - Roller Blind
products.description: Kindling in peacock is a fabric we fell in love with the moment we saw it, and we know you will too. It's the perfect marriage of a regal blue and a luxurious gold. The two colours take on a life of their own as they define a design that is sure to live long in the memory. The beauty of peacock is that it opens the door for royal reds and greens. These are the primary colours of sophisticated luxury, so why not embrace them at every turn? Throw in a little gold and silver for that ideal finishing touch.

products.title: Dune, Quince - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take a look at the vibrant green that calls dune quince home you'll find all sorts of decor ideas instantly come to mind. That's the impact it has on your creative way of thinking because of the way in which it radiates charm and charisma around the room. Take the opportunity to introduce matching electric blues to your space by adorning some of your accessories with touches of this ideal secondary colour.

products.title: Delicia, Madison - Roller Blind
products.description: The delicia madison unites rich burgundy florals with barely-there grey leaves, sitting on top of a creamy coloured light-filtering fabric, making it an ideal choice for a modern home where light and space are important. Using the madison in the master bedroom will give a feel of elegance and sophistication, with a contemporary twist and grown-up colour tones. Tame dark burgundy walls or provide cream walls with a quick hint of colour, and don't forget to accent with matching accessories.

products.title: Dune, Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Now, we don't like to use hyperbole all that often, but it's safe to say that dune crimson is one of the most striking combinations of colour and form we've seen in a long while. The minimalism provides the perfect canvas on which the depth of the red can explode into life. Matching the red with a dark navy blue is a great way to celebrate natural colour contrasts without running the risk of overdoing things.

products.title: Anthology, Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's an iconic colour and texture that you need in your home then it has to be denim. We thought so for years, which is why we jumped at the chance to add anthology denim to their portfolio of roller blind fabrics. It's a creative mix of blue and white that enables you to go whichever way you want with your decor. The conservatory could be a great option because it combines light and a gentle breeze in a way no other room in the house does.

products.title: Anthology, Tuscan Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Tuscan earth is a hearty and wholesome brown that's been faded in with a crisp white to produce a timeless quality that it's hard to quantify. That's the beauty of great decor because you know it when you see it, and yet it can be so hard to do in the first place. When you want to explore options for the bedroom makeover, why not look into shabby chic? It works wonders when set against the faded brown of tuscan earth, and offers plenty of scope for repurposing furniture.

products.title: Anthology, Cobra - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, slate grey of the anthology cobra is one of depth and warmth, and can create a moody or a natural feel depending on the rest of a room's dcor. Its high quality, grainy finish makes it a delight to use and this sturdy fabric is sure to last year after year. Use in the home office alongside medium woods and white walls for a clean, no-nonsense look, or team with paler greys and beiges in the living room or bedroom for a contemporary but atmospheric feel.

products.title: Anthology, Abyss - Roller Blind
products.description: The neutral grey of the anthology abyss is a great colour match for most shades, being a subtle, natural tone. This hushed tone will bring the outside in, and its dim-out properties make it a practical choice, not just a stylish one. For an outdoorsy look in a kitchen or utility, match the abyss with hessian fabrics, wicker furniture, and worn woods, with some wildflowers to complete the look. Or instead, add to a cream home office for a comfortable, clean look and the ideal room to get down to work.

products.title: Anthology, Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology macaroon cream combines an intricate countryside weave with a rich and homely creamy shade that instantly makes you feel at home. It's a subtle infusion of warmth and refinement that is just perfect when you want to add a gentle finish to any room in the house. Think about how you want to create a guest bedroom that will instantly make your visitors feel at home. A few country landscapes on the wall, warm white bulbs in the bedside lamps, and of course a few throws over the end of the bed.

products.title: Apollo, Aspire - Roller Blind
products.description: The light grey of the apollo aspire adds a versatile neutrality to any window it's used in. Its high quality fabric makes it durable and hardwearing, whilst still being light enough to allow the daylight to gently filter through. The aspire works brilliantly with its sister slates and charcoals, yet also works well at taming bolder reds, blues, and oranges. Use in the living room to complement strong patterns or bright colours, whilst adding a natural feel to the room.

products.title: Anthology, Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: Inspirational quality is the only way to describe sand dune, and if you think we're exaggerating then just look at the intricacy of the weave. It's the foundation on which the rest of the design is built, and offers plenty of room for the subtle flecks of white to express themselves. Matching sand dune with other textured finishes like fine wooden grains and cracked leather is a great way to build a theme that's about more than just pure colour.

products.title: Faux Suede Charcoal Curtain
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede charcoal curtain in a lovely greycolour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. Product id: db-cur0004 fabric colour: charcoal material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes faux suede charcoal curtain in grey.

products.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Joyford Dark Denim Curtain
products.description: An affordable textured weave fabric, their joyford range comes in a few neutral grey tones. Great for minimalist homes or to add an earthy finish to your room. Add natural accessories and greenery with this deep navy blue denim shade to create a modern lush finish to your room. products.description: Venice is a plush velvet-like fabric in luxury neutral shades.
